text.openpacbp.no_party_party_manage:
§7You must create a guild to use the guild management menu! 
§7To create a guild, type §8/§bopenpac-parties §3create§r.
text.openpacbp.party_limit_reached: §7Your guild has reached the maximum number of chunks!
text.openpacbp.party_required: §7You must be in a guild to claim land!
text.openpacbp.player_already_in_party: Player %s is already in our guild!
text.openpacbp.player_not_in_party: Player %s is not in our guild!
tooltip.openpacbp.admin_rank_button_desc: This button will change the rank of the player specified above to guild administrator.
tooltip.openpacbp.color_box_desc:
Enter a new guild color and it will be applied.
Input supports HEX format, but you can also use the preset color buttons below.
§cAttention! This option can only be used by guild owners!
tooltip.openpacbp.leave_button_desc: To exit the menu, press this button. If you want to save changes, press ''Save''.
tooltip.openpacbp.manage_allies_box_desc:
Enter the name of a guild owner to add or remove their guild from allies.
You can press TAB to switch between players currently online.
tooltip.openpacbp.manage_player_box_desc:
Enter a player’s name to interact with them using the buttons below.
You can press TAB to switch between players currently online.
tooltip.openpacbp.market_button_desc: To go to the guild market, press this button.
tooltip.openpacbp.member_rank_button_des: This button will change the rank of the player specified above to regular guild member.
tooltip.openpacbp.moderator_rank_button_: This button will change the rank of the player specified above to guild moderator.
tooltip.openpacbp.save_button_desc: To save changes, press this button.
tooltip.openpacbp.text_box_desc:
Enter a new guild name and it will be renamed.
§cAttention! This option can only be used by guild owners!
